statements: DELETE FROM influencer_tracking WHERE influencer_id = 123 AND post_id = 456;
DELETE FROM influencer_tracking WHERE conversions > 10 OR user_interactions < 5;
DELETE FROM influencers WHERE influencer_id = 1 AND followers > 10000;
DELETE FROM user_interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'like' AND influencer_id = 3;
DELETE FROM Interactions WHERE user_id = 5 AND interaction_type = 'like';
DELETE FROM conversion WHERE user_id = 100 AND conversion_date < '2021-12-31';
DELETE FROM user_interaction WHERE interaction_date < '2022-01-15' AND interaction_type = 'like';
